message.entry: For the syntax spdiags(B,d,A), B must be a matrix of size min(size(A))-by-length(d), a row vector of length length(d), a column vector of length min(size(A)), or a scalar.
For the syntax spdiags(B,d,m,n), B must be a matrix of size min(m,n)-by-length(d), a row vector of length length(d), a column vector of length min(m,n), or a scalar.
The dimension sizes must be nonnegative integer scalars.
The diagonal numbers must be integers.
B must be a full double or logical matrix.
B must be a full single, double, or logical matrix.
B must be a matrix of size min(m,n)-by-length(d), a row vector of length length(d), a column vector of length min(m,n), or a scalar.
d must be a double vector of integer scalars, sorted in descending order, and must not contain any duplicates.
The value of m must be greater than or equal to the value n.
